entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
